cancelServiceSearch

public boolean cancelServiceSearch(int transID)
Request the library to stop an async Search. If the library only supports synchronous searches the method fails and returns false

Parameters:
transID -
Returns:
true if the service search transaction is terminated, else false if the transID does not represent an active asynchronous service search transaction

asyncSearchServices

public int asyncSearchServices(int[] attrSet,
                               UUID[] uuidSet,
                               RemoteDevice device,
                               DiscoveryListener listener)
Starts an asynchronous search of services for a device. Returns immediately.

Parameters:
attrSet -
uuidSet -
device -
listener -
Returns:
A reference to the initiated search or zero if async isn't enabled in the native library.
